评论详情: It’s very loose and reminded me of a MuMu. It didn’t give me a “cute bump”. I just looked frumpy. The pattern was also a lot louder than I expected.

Surprisingly became a favorite during pregnancy. Got lots of compliments. Was able to wear a medium through the entire pregnancy, which is my normal size. Will probably work nicely for after, but I haven’t worn it yet.
I love the material and fit of this dress. So elegant and comfortable. It washed well and the pockets are a big size. Also the top doesn't gap.
Fit is fine enough but it looks a lot cheaper than in the images.

Bought this dress in army green, and it was AMAZING! I decided to purchase another one in sky blue for my baby shower, and it reeks strongly of perfume. Someone definitely used this dress before me and they sent it to me as brand new.

Our theme was woodland, so the color and pattern was perfect! The fabric was soft, breathable, and lightweight. It fit me well and was easy to wash. The weight listed is what I was when I was wearing it.
Super soft! True to size. Super comfy

This dress was perfect for my baby shower. The color and material matched the images. I really appreciated that the sizing was accurate for the size chart. I bought a large. I was about 185lbs at the time. It is a very pretty dress, and I got lots of compliments.

I was BLOWN AWAY how great this dress is. It is so forgiving yet flattering, I felt really beautiful in it! Quality with Amazon products can be mixed but this did not look or feel cheap at all. It’s actually nice enough that I have worn it to some fancy holiday dinners and got compliments. For other short mamas, be aware it came down to my ankles (I’m 5’2”) but I didn’t mind this at all, adds to that timeless look.
This dress is great. I got a lot of compliments on it. It fit my 29 week belly in it. The material is T-shirt like but still looked fancy enough for a baby shower.
Great quality. It looks more expensive than it is. I'm pretty short, 5'0 and it was just above the ground. It will be too long for anyone under 5' or with a small bump. Just keep that in mind

I love this dress. It’s very comfortable, flattering and stretchy. I’m 28 weeks pregnant and got this dress for my maternity pictures. I loved how they turned out and how nice i felt in the dress during the session. The value for money is worth it. I wore heals with the dress because I’m 5’4 which i think is needed so it doesn’t fall to low. Overall, great value for money
Very comfy and cute. Material is lightweight. I wore this dress up til my due date and am also able to wear it postpartum. Great value for the money. True to size.

Highly recommend. Very cute and flattering for pregnancy. Value for money is decent but may be a little high. Can machine wash this and hang dry. Fit and cut are great. The green dress is a very functional color!
Retuend.  Very unflattering on me
Got this dress for my maternity photo shoot! It’s good material and isn’t static as I had winter pics done so it didn’t stick to my legs. Very flattering and I love the color!

First time delivered the box was damaged no dress in Box Received 2nd order/1st dress on November 1st and the material smelled. Hung it out to air it out. Daughter tried on today (she has been out of state for work for a month) for her function this week end December 22nd and the stitching on dress is all mislined that the dress does not hang correctly it still smells and the material throughout the dress the color does not match Above all this we can not return as it is 10 days past return date. Waste of time and money!! Amazon should be ashamed to carry a product like this!! Had to choose rating or I would not have given any stars. We purchase a lot from Amazon but i think we will start looking elsewhere. To bad they used to carry such good merchandise

5’9, 25 weeks pregnant. Got a size L. Length was good but the sleeves ran short, not what is show in the photo. Received compliments on the dress but honestly didn’t think it looked as elegant in person as it does is the photos. For a maternity dress it was fine.

I had ordered this dress after having a few others not fit the belly very well. Dress was very comfortable and fit perfectly. The length was perfect and I could probably even wear it after I have the baby as it seems it will be good for breastfeeding.

My husband surprised me with this dress and it is my favorite maternity dress! I will certainly wear it once I am no longer pregnant. It will be easy to breastfeed in too! Seriously one of the cutest and best fitting maternity items I have ever had, and this is my 3rd pregnancy! I get so many compliments and it is super comfy. The print and sleeves are more beautiful in person.

Love the fabric! It is silky soft and very stretchy. The sinching part of the waist is right below the breast, which is the narrowest part of my waist right now (while pregnant). I find this the most flattering. Not every maternity dress is like that. Truly love it!  5'6" was 150 before pregnancy, now 180. A large fit perfectly.
I love this maternity dress. It is soft and sweet and flattering! I ordered a second color.
This dress was super cozy and fit great. Worked perfectly for our maternity photos!
Great fit. Wore for maternity photos and baby shower. Flattering and true to size. Has pockets and good length, doesn’t drag on floor and I’m 5’2. Color as photographed.

I like it so much I bought 2 colors (green flowers and red flowers). Comfortable, easy access nursing, flattering during and post pregnancy, affordable, lightweight, love! I was nervous about the fabric at first but it’s so stretchy and drapes well. I got my normal size (large) and it’s a perfect fit.
I got a large and it was perfect for my baby shower! Very soft and comfortable

Size Medium 5'2" 160lbs pregnant. I wore this for both my baby shower and my maternity photos. The dress is easy to wash. It does get wrinkly fast, so I steamed it after washing it to make sure I looked clean cut.  I will continue to wear this dress to all holiday and parties during the pregancy

评论概述: Floral fabric very different from solid colors

评论详情: I love the fit of this dress. It's been great for me through pregnancy, postpartum and nursing. I own it in black and green, and recently ordered the mini floral print one for a friend's baby shower. The fit is consistent and it's cute, but the fabric is entirely different from the solid-color ones that I own. The floral fabric is all polyester, no cotton, and it is slightly shiny. Unfortunately the shininess makes it seem more dressy, not casual enough for the event I ordered it for. Will be returning. Darn.
The color is as advertised and it’s not see through. The material is comfortable and not super thick. I liked the length and thought it was a cute maternity fit!
Got this dress for my baby shower and it was great! I’m 5’5”, currently 170lb and 31 weeks pregnant. It fit perfectly and was comfortable!
Nice fabric, very cool/doesn’t retain heat and make you sweaty. Won’t wrinkle. It runs a little big, so size down.
Purchased this for my baby shower, loved it. Comfortable, flattering, and pretty. Material is okay, but definitely a good one to keep in the closet for certain occasions while pregnant.

It’s so hard finding good maternity clothes. I had bought this dress for my baby shower. So comfortable, fits great, and the material is breathable. I got a ton of compliments on this dress and will definitely buy more colors for my next pregnancy.

I like the material, look, and cut of this dress. Of all my maternity outfits, I reached for this the most often if I was trying to look good at a work engagement. It was also easy to clean!

I got the stress to wear to a wedding a few weeks ago and let me tell you it is so comfortable! The fabric is very soft on the skin. I wore this dress for my baby shower and it was so comfy! I was 28 weeks at the time and I felt it accentuated the bump! I feel as though I could have sized down because there was extra room, but it didn’t look baggy or anything like that. Highly recommend!!

This is dressier than I initially assumed it would be. It’s a beautiful dress. I bought it as a comfy outfit to wear to work since I’m 18.5 weeks pregnant and pants are becoming uncomfortable, but it’s definitely too dressy for the lab environment I work in (and a little too long for my 5’2” frame to be worn without heels). It will, however, be perfect for the 2 weddings I will be attending next month. My only complaint is that where the materials stretches around my bra line on my back, the fabric noticeably lightens. I want to emphasize that it isn’t see through at all, but the lightening effect gives the impression that it could be. I could probably fix this by going up a size, but it’s not that bad and I don’t want any extra length. It’s still beautiful and comfortable. Emphasizes the bump too. I ordered a large (for reference I was 172lbs prior to pregnancy and have yet to gain any weight at 18.5 weeks).
Ordered this dress as a last minute option looks nice but had to quickly wash it smells like pee or cat litter hopefully the wash will take away the smell

It looked okay, I didn’t like the split sleeve look. Made my chest area look top notch enough to where I almost didn’t return it. Alas, it still just wasn’t what I was looking for. It looked a little cheap (I know, you get what you pay for LOL)

I’ve only worn it once for my maternity photo shoot, but hopefully as I wear it more the fabric loses some of the natural wrinkles. The size was perfect. I ordered this dress in two colors and while they are very cute in person they run very small. I usually am an XL and that was so tight I couldn't get my arms in let alone my pregnancy body. Additionally, the material is not of the best quality, so keep that in mind for longevity and washing

Beautiful for my baby shower while pregnant with twins! Material is lightweight and stretchy and very comfortable. Wore with a regular bra. Runs true to size, wore an XL and am normally a size 14-16 in clothes.
Color is just as described, I could’ve gone down in size. It has a lot of stretch to it. Great for my maternity photos.
Wore this for my baby shower and I loved that it had pockets!! Fit was very flattering and I loved the color!

I tried dozens of dresses trying to find one that would work for an event. Not see through and a lovely flowy fit. Fabric held up well and was comfortable. Great value for the money.

类型: Size: MediumColor: Short Sleeve Light Blue
评论详情: Ordered the light blue for my gender reveal, for almost 50$ it looks cheap. Returned immediately.

Dress was way too short and came in a vacuum sealed package that made it incredibly wrinkled. Material is also very thin so the cross area in the chest looks funny instead of flattering. Not flowy like pictures show.
Color is true to photo. I think the sizing is true to size. I normally wear a medium/ large and got a large to have a little room and it fit great.
The dress feels very cheaply made, thin see through material. I’ve gotten better quality from shein for a fraction of the price this dress shouldn’t cost more than $10 for the quality

I bought the pink with white & blue floral print in medium. I am 8 months pregnant , 5 ft ,175 lbs . It fit with plenty of room to grow , but the material is too thin. It’s thin and soft and stretchy and wrinkles easily . I have a hunch that some of the other colors may be more of a cotton material & are less shiny / thin. With this one, you could see all of the lines from my undergarments when viewed from the back . It was okay but really not the most flattering. It also dipped too low in the cleavage, it needs a safety pin or shirt underneath . I honestly think all of the good reviews are ladies who rarely wear dresses so it’s a novelty . And everyone compliments pregnant women on their baby shower . I did order the long sleeved green to try as I think it’s a thicker more cotton material. I’ll edit after I receive that one.

评论概述: Pregnant and it fits! The confidence boost I so desperately needed.
评论详情: I love this dress! I bought a Large, I am 16.5 weeks pregnant and I’m already showing. 5’8” 212 pounds. I have been struggling with my self confidence because literally none of my old dresses fit due to my roundness. So I decided to take a chance and buy this simple dress.  Pros: Long length Lightweight breathable material. I did not sweat in it! A lot of chest room Fits in all the right places Has pockets Simple and can be worn on many occasions. Has long sleeves to hide my chunky arms. Looks amazing on round baby belly Flowy and has room to grow for the belly and chest regions. I love the design of the chest area. I have tried other dresses and I was afraid I was going to have a wardrobe malfunction: this dress was not that way. The chest area has room to grow but still looks flattering!  Cons: I wish the sleeves were a little longer. I have long arms. Kind of a stiff cotton tee shirt material? It’s not the softest but I like that that it doesn’t cause me to sweat like most materials do.  Overall amazing dress. I am so glad I found something that I feel confident wearing in public. Will buy more colors!
Muy amplio y fresco, un poco largo para mi gusto, lo use en los últimos meses de mi embarazo.  Llegue a pesar casi 200 libras y me quedo muy bien .
I got this for my courthouse wedding and it fit so nicely over my 25 week belly! I can see myself wearing this several more times. It even has pockets!

类型: Size: XX-LargeColor: Short Sleeve Gray Green
评论详情: So I’m not pregnant but I am a bigger bodied lady. I have been trying to find a dress I like the fit of and let me tell you it’s been quite the experience. After finding this one and feeling beautiful in it I now want one in every color!!

Beautiful dress and very comfortable! I am typically a small pre-pregnancy (and about 120 pounds) and a small in this dress worked perfectly! I have gained some weight during this pregnancy and am now in the 140-150 range in the third trimester (all baby!). I get so many compliments on this dress and it has become a favorite, especially being pregnant during the hot summer!  Tip - get some pasties/nipple covers to wear with this instead of trying to fuss with a bra!
I bought this for my maternity pictures, and it was good quality and very comfy.
The material seems kind of cheap, and it runs small so it’s very clingy . The color was great and had it fit right it would of been light and flowy
It fits true to size, is very comfortable and is sooooo beautiful! More than I expected, I definitely recommend it! I got a medium. I plan to use it for maternity pictures and also after delivery.

评论概述: I’m not pregnant and I love these
评论详情: So I have bought these in 3 different colors. I am not pregnant. But these are just so comfortable and flattering. I gained a few pounds and don’t want anything skin tight. They have nice sized pockets!! And the sleeves are super cute in my opinion. These are just the perfect dress for church especially with kids. Easy to move in. Forgiving and comfortable.

评论概述: Not pregnant but the only real difference is the side zipper
评论详情: I have bought another dress from this company in the same style but non-maternity and so I checked their offerings first when I was looking for a dress for an event. The patterns I liked most were not available in the regular version, so I ended up ordering three different "maternity" dresses with the intention of returning at least two. I ordered a size smaller than my normal size. The only differences between this and the non-maternity style is this one has no side zipper, and the sleeves do not have the little overlap feature. There also seems to be a bit more fabric in the skirt, so since I am not pregnant, the length was a little longer than the non-maternity version. I liked them and ended up keeping all three and always get lots of compliments when I wear them.

类型: Size: LargeColor: Short Sleeve Gray Green
评论详情: Comfortable dress and looked good too.  It will also be great when I am not pregnant, it will be nursing friendly too which will be great.
Terrible quality. I'm surprised by the number of good reviews. I had to return this. It's very thin material, and the sleeves are too short. Very unflattering for a maternity dress.

评论概述: Beautiful but appears stretched in spots

Nice dress but the smell is awful. I tried to wash it off but it didn't come out. Will be wearing for a photoshoot and then going to donate!
I love how this fits & the material is good quality but it's not too warm! I also love that I can wear it postpartum. I'd love to have it in every color!
I wore this during pregnancy and postpartum and i love it so much. It's so comfortable and flattering.
So soft!! Can use for more than just maternity wear!!

I got so many compliments on this dress. It is very easy to wear, looks good, and great for Florida summers. And the pockets are actually a decent size! I'm 5'9", 8 months pregnant, very busty, and the XL was great. If my bust was smaller I could definitely go with a large, maybe even a medium, it's very stretchy.

I was expecting a nice strechy fabric. There is little to no strech in the fabric it is breathable but not a good fabric. When I put it on it looked like a hospital gown. The color was nice and it wasn't transparent. It was difficult to put on because there was no strech and it was just not flattering at all. Also the sleeves had this weird puff that did not fit on my shoulders properly. I ended up returning and getting a refund.
